verses.verse: A Psalm of David.<WH1732> Fret<WH2734> not yourself because of evildoers,<WH7489> neither<WH408> be you envious<WH7065> against the workers<WH6213> of iniquity.<WH5766>
For they shall soon<WH4120> be cut<WH5243> down<WH5243> like the grass,<WH2682> and wither<WH5034> as the green<WH3418> herb.<WH1877>
Trust<WH982> in the LORD,<WH3068> and do<WH6213> good;<WH2896> so shall you dwell<WH7931> in the land,<WH776> and truly<WH530> you shall be fed.<WH7462>
Delight<WH6026> yourself also in the LORD:<WH3068> and he shall give<WH5414> you the desires<WH4862> of your heart.<WH3820>
Commit<WH1556> your way<WH1870> to the LORD;<WH3068> trust<WH982> also in him; and he shall bring<WH6213> it to pass.<WH6213>
And he shall bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> your righteousness<WH6664> as the light,<WH216> and your judgment<WH4941> as the noonday.<WH6672>

Rest<WH1826> in the LORD,<WH3068> and wait<WH2342> patiently<WH2342> for him: fret<WH2734> not yourself because of him who prospers<WH6743> in his way,<WH1870> because of the man<WH376> who brings<WH6213> wicked<WH4209> devices<WH4209> to pass.<WH6213>
Cease<WH7503> from anger,<WH639> and forsake<WH5800> wrath:<WH2534> fret<WH2734> not yourself in any wise to do evil.<WH7489>
For evildoers<WH7489> shall be cut<WH3772> off: but those that wait<WH6960> on the LORD,<WH3068> they shall inherit<WH3423> the earth.<WH776>
For yet<WH5750> a little<WH4592> while, and the wicked<WH7563> shall not be: yes, you shall diligently<WH995> consider<WH995> his place,<WH4725> and it shall not be.
But the meek<WH6035> shall inherit<WH3423> the earth;<WH776> and shall delight<WH6026> themselves in the abundance<WH7230> of peace.<WH7965>
The wicked<WH7563> plots<WH2161> against the just,<WH6662> and gnashes<WH2786> on him with his teeth.<WH8127>
The LORD<WH136> shall laugh<WH7832> at him: for he sees<WH7200> that his day<WH3117> is coming.<WH935>

The wicked<WH7563> have drawn<WH6605> out the sword,<WH2719> and have bent<WH1869> their bow,<WH7198> to cast<WH5307> down<WH5307> the poor<WH6041> and needy,<WH34> and to slay<WH2873> such as be of upright<WH3477> conversation.<WH1870>
Their sword<WH2719> shall enter<WH935> into their own heart,<WH3820> and their bows<WH7198> shall be broken.<WH7665>
A little<WH4592> that a righteous<WH6662> man has is better<WH2896> than the riches<WH1995> of many<WH7227> wicked.<WH7563>
For the arms<WH2220> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be broken:<WH7665> but the LORD<WH3068> upholds<WH5564> the righteous.<WH6662>
The LORD<WH3068> knows<WH3045> the days<WH3117> of the upright:<WH8549> and their inheritance<WH5159> shall be for ever.<WH5769>
They shall not be ashamed<WH954> in the evil<WH7451> time:<WH6256> and in the days<WH3117> of famine<WH7459> they shall be satisfied.<WH7646>

But the wicked<WH7563> shall perish,<WH6> and the enemies<WH341> of the LORD<WH3068> shall be as the fat<WH3368> of lambs:<WH3733> they shall consume;<WH3615> into smoke<WH6227> shall they consume<WH3615> away.
The wicked<WH7563> borrows,<WH3867> and pays<WH7999> not again:<WH7999> but the righteous<WH6662> shows mercy,<WH2603> and gives.<WH5414>
For such as be blessed<WH1288> of him shall inherit<WH3423> the earth;<WH776> and they that be cursed<WH7043> of him shall be cut<WH3772> off.
The steps<WH4703> of a good man<WH1397> are ordered<WH3559> by the LORD:<WH3068> and he delights<WH2654> in his way.<WH1870>
Though<WH3588> he fall,<WH5307> he shall not be utterly cast<WH2904> down:<WH2904> for the LORD<WH3068> upholds<WH5564> him with his hand.<WH3027>
I have been<WH1961> young,<WH5288> and now am old;<WH2204> yet have I not seen<WH7200> the righteous<WH6662> forsaken,<WH5800> nor his seed<WH2233> begging<WH1245> bread.<WH3899>
He is ever<WH3605> <WH3117> merciful,<WH2603> and lends;<WH3867> and his seed<WH2233> is blessed.<WH1293>
Depart<WH5493> from evil,<WH7451> and do<WH6213> good;<WH2896> and dwell<WH7931> for ever more.<WH5769>

For the LORD<WH3068> loves<WH157> judgment,<WH4941> and forsakes<WH5800> not his saints;<WH2623> they are preserved<WH8104> for ever:<WH5769> but the seed<WH2233> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be cut<WH3772> off.
The righteous<WH6662> shall inherit<WH3423> the land,<WH776> and dwell<WH7931> therein<WH5921> for ever.<WH5703>
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> speaks<WH1897> wisdom,<WH2451> and his tongue<WH3956> talks<WH1696> of judgment.<WH4941>
The law<WH8451> of his God<WH430> is in his heart;<WH3820> none<WH3808> of his steps<WH838> shall slide.<WH4571>
The wicked<WH7563> watches<WH6822> the righteous,<WH6662> and seeks<WH1245> to slay<WH4191> him.
The LORD<WH3068> will not leave<WH5800> him in his hand,<WH3027> nor<WH3808> condemn<WH7561> him when he is judged.<WH8199>

Wait<WH6960> on the LORD,<WH3068> and keep<WH8104> his way,<WH1870> and he shall exalt<WH7311> you to inherit<WH3423> the land:<WH776> when the wicked<WH7563> are cut<WH3772> off, you shall see<WH7200> it.
I have seen<WH7200> the wicked<WH7563> in great power,<WH6184> and spreading<WH6168> himself like a green<WH7488> bay<WH249> tree.
Yet he passed<WH5674> away, and, see,<WH2009> he was not: yes, I sought<WH1245> him, but he could not be found.<WH4672>
Mark<WH8104> the perfect<WH8535> man, and behold<WH7200> the upright:<WH3477> for the end<WH319> of that man<WH376> is peace.<WH7965>
But the transgressors<WH6586> shall be destroyed<WH8045> together:<WH3162> the end<WH319> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be cut<WH3772> off.
But the salvation<WH8668> of the righteous<WH6662> is of the LORD:<WH3068> he is their strength<WH4581> in the time<WH6256> of trouble.<WH6869>
And the LORD<WH3068> shall help<WH5826> them, and deliver<WH6403> them: he shall deliver<WH6403> them from the wicked,<WH7563> and save<WH3467> them, because<WH3588> they trust<WH2620> in him.
